price: 他们说：不然！警告者确已降临我们了，但我们否认他们，我们说：“安拉没有降示什么，你们只在重大的迷误中。'
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ قَدۡ جَآءَنَا نَذِيرٞ فَكَذَّبۡنَا وَقُلۡنَا مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَيۡءٍ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَٰلٖ كَبِيرٖ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū balā qad jāanā nadhīrun fakadhabnā waqul'nā mā nazzala al-lahu min shayin in antum illā fī ḍalālin kabīrin
